name: Next.js S3 Complete Multipart
description: Complete multipart upload given parts ETags.

files.template:
import { S3Client, CompleteMultipartUploadCommand } from '@aws-sdk/client-s3';
export async function POST(req: Request){ const { uploadId, parts } = await req.json(); const s3 = new S3Client({}); const out = await s3.send(new CompleteMultipartUploadCommand({ Bucket: process.env.S3_BUCKET!, Key:'big.bin', UploadId: uploadId, MultipartUpload: { Parts: parts } })); return Response.json({ location: out.Location }); }
